channel.title: How do i mute, kick ,ban?
channel.description:
How do i mute someone on my server?
When i type ::kick playername it kicksthem then relogs then?
how do i ban someone
how do i ip ban someone?
and is there anyway to put all this on the rightclick of a person? for mods and admins only?
btw im using dodian v7

item.title: How do i mute, kick ,ban?
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

::kick Boots You Then Back In - Kick Them Again Trust me
::ipban (playername) [::ipban jamie1200]
::ban (playername) [::ban Jamie1200]

Read full topic
